index.title: Russian housing rental service - more than 100 thousand of apartments, rooms, guest houses for daily rent — Sutochno.ru
index.description: Sutochno.ru will help you to choose of housing in Russia and its near abroad. Our advantages are the following: no intermediaries or commission; check-in is guaranteed. A popular destination: Moscow, St. Petersburg, Kazan, Ekaterinburg, Novosibirsk, Sochi, Crimea, Abkhazia and other.
index.keywords: A daily apartment, an apartment on a day, a building, a cottages, a housing,a hotel, a service, a booking, no hidden fees.

search.title: Apartment for rent in {city}, the lease an apartment {city} Sutochno.ru
search.description: Rent out an apartment direct by the host without agents and an extra cost in {city}.
